title: Chicken Breast & Peas Traybake
method: Prep: finely chop the peas and slice the buckwheat.
Preheat oven to 200°C.
Toss chicken breast with oil, salt, pepper and spices; spread on a tray with veg.
Roast for 23–29 minutes until chicken breast is cooked through (75°C internal for poultry).
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve chicken breast neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped chives, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean French presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.

Air-fry for 26–32 minutes until Greek yogurt is cooked through (75°C internal for poultry).
Rest meat 3–5 min if applicable. Season to taste with lemon, herbs, and chili to preference.
Plate as suggested below and enjoy.
plating: Serve Greek yogurt neatly over grains with veg to one side; finish with chopped tarragon, a wedge of lemon, and a drizzle of olive oil for a clean Swedish presentation.
hydrationTip: Add 300–500 ml water with the meal, more if training on the day.
swaps: Swap grains for cauliflower rice for lower carbs.
Use tofu or chicken interchangeably to suit dietary preference.
Add chili to taste for more heat.
